lead_paragraph: Jordan Spieth’s caddie urged fans not to feel sorry for the Masters runner-up on Wednesday despite his final-round meltdown at Augusta.

headline.main: Do Not Feel Sorry for Spieth, Urges Caddie Greller
headline.print_headline: Do Not Feel Sorry for Spieth, Urges Caddie Greller

snippet: Jordan Spieth’s caddie urged fans not to feel sorry for the Masters runner-up on Wednesday despite his final-round meltdown at Augusta....
